text:
Gia Scala (March 3, 1934 – April 30, 1972) was an English-born Italian-American actress and model. She was born in Liverpool. Scala was known for her roles in "Tip on a Dead Jockey" (1957), "The Garment Jungle" (1957), "The Tunnel of Love" (1958), and "The Guns of Navarone" (1961).
Scala died of an accidental ethanol and barbiturate overdose at her home in Los Angeles on April 30, 1972 at the age of 38.
